item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Tube Computer (100 points | 33 comments)
2. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (198 points | 366 comments)
3. Egoless Engineering (49 points | 10 comments)
4. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (30 points | 28 comments)
5. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (127 points | 53 comments)
6. Show HN: I built an AI tool to analyze SEC filings the minute they're released (43 points | 33 comments)
7. My brand new digitizing workflow using a 25 year old film scanner (53 points | 24 comments)
8. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
9. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (9 points | 1 comment)
10. Amazon Nova (194 points | 68 comments)
11. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D engine (161 points | 35 comments)
12. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (45 points | 17 comments)
13. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (82 points | 118 comments)
14. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (127 points | 118 comments)
15. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (411 points | 157 comments)
16. Text Editing Hates You Too (2019) (64 points | 19 comments)
17. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (16 points | 3 comments)
18. Student rocket group shatters amateur space record (230 points | 199 comments)
19. MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation (24 points | 3 comments)
20. On-scalp printing of personalized electroencephalography e-tattoos (30 points | 1 comment)
21. The Curse of Markdown (80 points | 67 comments)
22. California teacher dies from suspected rabid bat bite (42 points | 58 comments)
23. DuckDuckGo donates $25k to the Perl and Raku Foundation (213 points | 121 comments)
24. What does LETTER. do in LISTRD in FAP from 196x? (16 points | 2 comments)
25. Vintage digicams are an artistic statement (86 points | 164 comments)
26. MTA's A.I. bus cameras issue mistaken parking violations (54 points | 50 comments)
27. Amazon Aurora DSQL (120 points | 77 comments)
28. Stephen King to shut down his 3 radio stations in Maine (65 points | 92 comments)
29. Rust in QEMU Roadmap (207 points | 116 comments)
30. AI poetry is indistinguishable from human poetry and is rated more favorably (61 points | 110 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
